structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text:
The following persons shall become members of the fund:
All active full-time members of a department in service on the day prior to the date of establishment.
All persons who become full-time members on or after the date of establishment who shall become members as a condition of employment.
All members of a department who on the date of establishment are working in a civilian or appointive capacity for the city, the State of Kentucky, or the United States of America, while on an approved leave of absence from a department.
law.history: Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 4, effective July 1, 1956.
